items.content_html: Eko is a lightweight web app that assists DJs in determining mix compatibility between songs. Based on live Spotify data, it investigates tempo, key, and energy to recommend harmonically compatible songs. Constructed with async JavaScript, Eko provides fast, live feedback in a simple interface
items.title: Liam-Woods-8/Eko: Eko is a lightweight web app that assists DJs in determining mix compatibility between songs. Based on live Spotify data, it investigates tempo, key, and energy to recommend harmonically compatible songs. Constructed with async JavaScript, Eko provides fast, live feedback in a simple interface
